name: autographic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
written in someone's own handwriting: She likes to collect first-edition novels with autographic inscriptions from the authors inside them. A professor at Inner Mongolia University found an autographic edict written by Ghengis Khan.
More examplesFewer examplesThe auction is said to include an impressive array of personal effects, photographs, and autographic material that once belonged to the author. The collector deals in rare books, autographic documents, and antiques known to belong to well-known historical figures. After she decided the painting was finished, she used white paint to add her signature to the bottom with an autographic flourish.
